projects.name: AIR POLLUTION PREDICTION SYSTEM
projects.description: Developed an Air Pollution Prediction System using Python, leveraging data filtered from CSV files to enhance accuracy. Implemented the Prophet algorithm to forecast pollution levels based on historical data, showcasing proficiency in data analysis and predictive modeling. Designed and executed data processing workflows to clean and prepare data, ensuring reliable predictions. Utilized advanced data visualization techniques to present forecasting results effectively, providing actionable insights into air quality trends and patterns.

projects.name: SIMON SAYS GAME
projects.description: Developed a Simon Says game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring interactive gameplay that challenges users to replicate increasingly complex sequences of colors and sounds. The game emphasizes a user-friendly interface and smooth game mechanics to ensure an engaging experience.

experiences.description: Completed an internship at Prodigy Infotech, where I successfully developed a project utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Gained hands-on experience in front-end web development, focusing on creating dynamic and responsive web interfaces. Worked on practical tasks that involved designing and implementing user-friendly web applications, enhancing both design and functionality.
